title: Anthony Davis
summary: Anthony Marshon Davis Jr. (born March 11, 1993), sometimes known simply by his initials AD,[1] is an American professional basketball player for the Los Angeles Lakers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). He plays the power forward and center positions. Davis is an eight-time NBA All-Star and has been named to four All-NBA First Teams and four NBA All-Defensive Teams. In his first season with the Lakers, he won an NBA championship in 2020. In 2021, he was honoured as one of the 75 Greatest Players in NBA History.[2]
